Ushuaia: the end of the world

We’re now on our way to El Calafate from Ushuaia. Ushuaia was such an incredible place to visit; we departed from Buenos Aires to the southernmost city in the world — a distinction that is hotly contested by Puerto Williams in Chile who also claim to be the southernmost city in the world.
